title: Lamb.of.God-Ashes.of.the.Wake[2004][MP3][320Kbps]-Magik
description:
Lamb of God - Ashes of the Wake [2004]
======================================

Released: August 31, 2004
Genre:    Death Metal
Length:   47:43
Label:    Epic Records
Producer: Machine

Track listing:
==============

   1. Laid to Rest ? 3:50
   2. Hourglass ? 4:00 (written by Willie Adler)
   3. Now You&#039;ve Got Something to Die For ? 3:39
   4. The Faded Line ? 4:37
   5. Omerta ? 4:45
   6. Blood of the Scribe ? 4:23 (written by Willie Adler)
   7. One Gun ? 3:59
   8. Break You ? 3:35
   9. What I&#039;ve Become ? 3:28
  10. Ashes of the Wake ? 5:45 (written by Willie Adler)
  11. Remorse is for the Dead ? 5:41 (written by Mark Morton)


Ashes of the Wake is the third album of Virginian metal band Lamb of God, released in 2004. It sold 35,000 copies in its first-week and was rated by Guitar World as the 49th greatest Guitar Album of all Time.The album is more political than their previous work, aimed at the war in Iraq, with songs such as "Ashes of the Wake","Now You&#039;ve Got Something to Die For", "The Faded Line", and "Laid to Rest", the last being featured, albeit censored, on Guitar Hero 2. As of August 30, 2006, Ashes of the Wake has sold more than 500,000 copies.
